channel.title: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)
channel.description:
Ok so i've been coding for 3 years, stopped, and started again now... The only problem is, when I came back, apperantly 317's can't get online with No-ip, here's some pics....
I CAN EDIT THE FILES, IT'S ONLY THE WHITE ICON THAT GETS ME CONFUSED....
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/29dfz1g.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/t6cs4n.jpg[/img]

My server source ftw! xD

item.source: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)

item.title: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)
item.dc:creator: @Jack3 Jack-
item.description:
@Jack3 wrote:

Odd… I have more two things would help you…

1:
Open Network & Internet Connections on your computer, then click with the right button, on the connection you are using to connect/use the internet, then click on ‘properties’. Now, just open the ‘Advanced’ tab and click on ‘firewall settings’. Open the ‘Exceptions’ tab, and at the bottom you should see a button “Add Port”, click on it… Add your server name or whatever you want it to be at the Name, field. (I usually use my server IP). At the ‘Port’ number, copy and paste… 43594 <-

2:

[img]http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Linksys/WRT54GC/WRT54GC3.jpg[/img]
[i](Picture from another site!)[/i] -

Add these things too! All!

Read full topic
item.source: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)

item.title: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)
item.dc:creator: @pk_man_owned pk_man_owned
item.description:
@pk_man_owned wrote:

[quote=“Jack-, post:5, topic:331825”]It happened with me too… Some months ago I used my computer (Vista) to host my server. Then, it stopped working by itself, but as I had two computers at my house, I switched of computer, so my other one (XP) hosts my server now.

The more strange here is, now I can host again at my my Vista one. I don’t know/remember what I did, but I can recommend to you somethings…

-Try checking if your account at no-ip is as it needs to be…
-Copy ‘192.168.1.1’, and paste at the white box where you type site adress… (Name: admin - Pass: admin) Then check if everything is right.
-Try re-starting your router…
-If you have other computer (as me); host it there…

Hope I helped. :)[/quote]

Thanks, one thing, don’t explain it to me like i’m a new gai and…

33ccg75.jpg1152×720

Read full topic
item.source: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)

item.title: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)
item.dc:creator: @Jack3 Jack-
item.description:
@Jack3 wrote:

It happened with me too… Some months ago I used my computer (Vista) to host my server. Then, it stopped working by itself, but as I had two computers at my house, I switched of computer, so my other one (XP) hosts my server now.

The more strange here is, now I can host again at my my Vista one. I don’t know/remember what I did, but I can recommend to you somethings…

-Try checking if your account at no-ip is as it needs to be…
-Copy ‘192.168.1.1’, and paste at the white box where you type site adress… (Name: admin - Pass: admin) Then check if everything is right.
-Try re-starting your router…
-If you have other computer (as me); host it there…

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)

item.title: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)
item.dc:creator: @pk_man_owned pk_man_owned
item.description:
@pk_man_owned wrote:

[quote=“Superd00d, post:3, topic:331825”]#1 Have you portforwarded?
#2 Have you enabled port 43594 usage?
#3 Do you have no-ip duc installed? (But then again you dont really need to install it)

If you dont have any of these things let me know and I’ll help.[/quote]

#1 Yes i PFwd
#2 Maybe, if you detail it more…
#3 Scroll the right on the pic, I have No-ip running

Read full topic

item.title: Noob needs help getting 317 online (easy fix)
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

#1 Have you portforwarded?
#2 Have you enabled port 43594 usage?
#3 Do you have no-ip duc installed? (But then again you dont really need to install it)

If you dont have any of these things let me know and I’ll help.

Read full topic
